properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) as "COUNT" FROM COMU_BOARD WHERE DELETE_YN = 'N'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT COMU_NO , NICKNAME , CATEGORY_NAME , TAG , TITLE , CONTENT , ENROLL_DATE , VIEW_COUNT FROM COMU_BOARD B JOIN CATEGORY USING(CATEGORY_NO) JOIN MEMBER USING (MEM_NO) WHERE DELETE_YN = 'N' ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
